summary: Discussion about a new roadmap planning tool developed by Adrian that allows visualization of projects, milestones, and resource allocation. The tool integrates with Asana and helps plan project timelines while tracking resource hours per month. Laura needs this for a Thursday meeting with Michael to show project completion timelines.
decisions: Tool will be used as internal planning aid, not shared directly with Michael
Will focus on hours and completion dates rather than resource allocation details for Michael

action_items.task: Get tool hosted on a webpage instead of localhost
Prepare timeline visualization for Thursday meeting with Michael

concerns: Tool currently only works on localhost
Data is stored in browser cache, not persistent
Need to avoid detailed resource allocation discussion with Michael
michael_priorities: Wants to know when goals will be completed based on resource allocation
commitments: Laura will prepare project timelines by Thursday
Adrian will support Laura in using the tool for planning
